      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: SocketService
        Waits for connection on given port using ServerSocket. Blocking method. Attempts to close previous socket if any.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface SocketService
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When an error during connection occurs.

        Returns:
        True if connection is online.

      • readFromSocket

        public void readFromSocket(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Object> receive)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: SocketService
        Allows for thread-safe reading. This method acquires read-lock, but doesn't lock socket from being closed or written to in the meantime. The only assert it provides is that only one thread may call this method at once.
        Specified by:
        readFromSocket in interface SocketService
        Parameters:
        receive - Called with the object received, or not called if error occurs.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When an IO error occurs.

      • writeToSocket

        public void writeToSocket(java.lang.Object o)
        Description copied from interface: SocketService
        Allows for thread-safe use of the socket. After acquiring lock on socket, it won't be closed or reopened. The lock is released after method returns. Fails silently.
        Specified by:
        writeToSocket in interface SocketService
        Parameters:
        o - Object sent into connection.
